coded_answer.p: I am writing to complain about the musical show "OVER THE RAINBOW", which I saw in your theatre on the 5th of June. I have been very disappointed by the quality of the show and the lies in your advertisement.

Firstly, I was looking forward to seeing Danny Brook, as written in the advertisement, but his part was played by another actor, without any information or excuseexplanation being given fromby the directionmanagement. Secondly, I coudn'tcouldn't get a discount with my student card and the show started 45 minutes laterlate. In addition, the theatre restaurant, where we had planned to eat, was closed because the cook was ill.
I am therefore asking for a complete refund of my ticket and I hope you will improve the quality of your services in the future.
